001package Tools;
002
003import java.awt.Desktop;
004import java.awt.Graphics2D;
005import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
006import java.awt.color.ICC_Profile;
007import java.io.FileOutputStream;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010import java.nio.file.Paths;
011
012import com.lowagie.text.Document;
013import com.lowagie.text.DocumentException;
014import com.lowagie.text.Rectangle;
015import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfContentByte;
016import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfGraphics2D;
017import com.lowagie.text.pdf.PdfWriter;
018
019import ij.IJ;
020import ij.ImagePlus;
021import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
022import ij.gui.Overlay;
023import ij.gui.Roi;
024import ij.io.SaveDialog;
025import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
026import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
027
028
029/**
030 * This ImageJ plugin exports the current image and its attached
031 * vector graphic overlay (if existent) as a PDF file.
032 * It uses the free OpenPDF library, which is based on iText4 but LGPL-licensed
033 * (see <a href="https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF">
034 * https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF</a>).
035 * 
036 * @author W. Burger
037 * @version 2021/04/05 (migrated to OpenPDF, added image properties)
038 * @version 2021/04/06 (added automatic image upscaling, open PFD after export)
039 * @version 2021/04/21 (converted from PlugInFilter to PlugIn)
040 */
041public class Export_PDF_With_Overlay implements PlugIn {
042        
043        private static boolean IncludeImage = true;
044        private static boolean IncludeOverlay = true;
045        private static boolean IncludeImageProps = true;
046        private static boolean UpscaleImage = true;
047        private static int ImageUpscaleFactor = 1;
048        private static int MinImageWidth = 300; // used to suggest ImageUpscaleFactor
049        private static boolean OpenPdfAfterExport = false;
050        
051        /**
052         * Set true to have a default ICC profile (sRGB) added
053         * to the PDF file. Solves problems with viewing
054         * files in Acrobat X+.
055         */
056        private static boolean AddIccProfile = true;
057
058        /**
059         * Used to draw graphic strokes with zero stroke width.
060         */
061        private static double DefaultStrokeWidth = 0.01;                // substitute for zero-width strokes
062        private static String DefaultFileExtension = ".pdf";
063        private static String CurrentOutputDirectory = "D:\\tmp"; //IJ.getDirectory("temp");
064        
065        private ImagePlus img;
066        
067        @Override
068        public void run(String arg) {
069                this.img = IJ.getImage();
070                if (img == null) 
071                        return;
072        
073                if (!verifyPdfLib()) {
074                        return;
075                }
076                
077                if (img.getStackSize() != 1) {
078                        IJ.error("Can only export single images (no stacks)!");
079                        return;
080                }
081                
082                ImageProcessor ip = img.getProcessor();
083                int width = ip.getWidth();
084                ImageUpscaleFactor = (width >= MinImageWidth) ?
085                                1 : (int) Math.ceil((double)MinImageWidth / width) ;
086                
087                if (!getUserInput()) {
088                        return;
089                }
090                
091                String dir = CurrentOutputDirectory;
092                String name = img.getShortTitle();
093                if (!UpscaleImage) {
094                        ImageUpscaleFactor = 1;
095                }
096                if (ImageUpscaleFactor > 1) {
097                        name = name + "X" + ImageUpscaleFactor;
098                }
099                
100                Path path = askForFilePath(dir, name, "Save as PDF");
101                if (path == null) {
102                        return;
103                }
104
105                String finalPath = createPdf(img, ImageUpscaleFactor, path);
106                if (finalPath == null) 
107                        IJ.error("PDF export failed to " + path.toString());
108                else
109                        IJ.log(String.format("PDF exported to %s (%d x upscaled)", finalPath, ImageUpscaleFactor));
110                
111                if (OpenPdfAfterExport && Desktop.isDesktopSupported()) {
112                        Desktop dt = Desktop.getDesktop();
113                        try {
114                                dt.open(path.toFile());
115                        } catch (Exception ex) {
116                                IJ.error("Could not open PDF file " + finalPath);
117                        }
118                }
119        }
120        
121        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
122        
123        /**
124         * Saves a PDF of the input image.
125         * @param im input image of type {@link ij.ImagePlus}, possibly with attached vector overlay
126         * @param upscale scale factor (must be greater than 0)
127         * @param path complete path to the created PDF file
128         * @return
129         */
130        private String createPdf(ImagePlus im, int upscale, Path path) {
131                final int width  = im.getWidth();       // original image size
132                final int height = im.getHeight();
133                Overlay overlay = im.getOverlay();      // original overlay (if any)
134                
135                // step 1: create the PDF document
136                Rectangle pageSize = new Rectangle(width, height);
137                Document document = new Document(pageSize);
138                
139                try {
140                        // step 2: create a PDF writer
141                        PdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.getInstance(document, new FileOutputStream(path.toFile()));
142                        
143                        // step 3: open the document
144                        document.open();
145                        
146                        // step 4: create a template and the associated Graphics2D context
147                        PdfContentByte cb = writer.getDirectContent();
148                        
149                        // optional: set sRGB default viewing profile
150                        if (AddIccProfile) {
151                                ICC_Profile colorProfile = ICC_Profile.getInstance(ColorSpace.CS_sRGB);
152                                writer.setOutputIntents("Custom", null, "http://www.color.org", "sRGB IEC61966-2.1", colorProfile);
153                                //byte[] iccdata = java.awt.color.ICC_Profile.getInstance(ColorSpace.CS_sRGB).getData();
154                                //com.itextpdf.text.pdf.ICC_Profile icc = com.itextpdf.text.pdf.ICC_Profile.getInstance(iccdata);
155                                //writer.setOutputIntents("Custom", null, "http://www.color.org", "sRGB IEC61966-2.1", icc);
156                        }
157                                                
158                        // insert the image
159                        if (IncludeImage) {
160                                if (upscale > 1) {      // upscale the image if needed (without interpolation)
161                                        im = im.resize(width * upscale, height * upscale, "none");
162                                }
163                                //IJ.log("exporting image of size " + im.getWidth() + "/" + im.getHeight());
164                                com.lowagie.text.Image pdfImg = com.lowagie.text.Image.getInstance(im.getImage(), null);
165                                pdfImg.setAbsolutePosition(0, 0);
166                                pdfImg.scaleToFit(width, height);       // fit to the original size             
167                                cb.addImage(pdfImg);
168                        }
169                        
170                        // optional: draw the vector overlay
171                        if (overlay != null && IncludeOverlay) {
172                                //IJ.log("exporting overlay");
173                                Graphics2D g2 = new PdfGraphics2D(cb, width, height);
174                                Roi[] roiArr = overlay.toArray();
175                                for (Roi roi : roiArr) {
176                                        float sw = roi.getStrokeWidth();
177                                        if (sw < 0.001f) {      // sometimes stroke width is simply not set (= 0)
178                                                roi.setStrokeWidth(DefaultStrokeWidth); // temporarily change stroke width
179                                        }
180                                        ImagePlus tmpIm = roi.getImage();
181                                        roi.setImage(null);     // trick learned from Wayne to ensure magnification is 1
182                                        roi.drawOverlay(g2);    // replacement (recomm. by Wayne)
183                                        roi.setImage(tmpIm);
184                                        roi.setStrokeWidth(sw); // restore original stroke width
185                                }
186                                g2.dispose();
187                        }
188                        
189                        // optional: copy ImagePlus custom properties to PDF
190                        if (IncludeImageProps) {
191                                String[] props = im.getPropertiesAsArray();
192                                if (props != null) {
193                                        for (int i = 0; i < props.length; i+=2) {
194                                                String key = props[i];
195                                                String val = props[i + 1];
196                                                document.addHeader(key, val);
197                                        }
198                                }
199                        }
200                        
201                } catch (DocumentException de) {
202                        IJ.log(de.getMessage());
203                } catch (IOException ioe) {
204                        IJ.log(ioe.getMessage());
205                }
206                
207                // step 5: close the document
208                document.close();
209                return path.toString();
210        }
211        
212        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
213        
214        private boolean getUserInput() {
215                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Export PDF");
216                
217                gd.addCheckbox("Include overlay", IncludeOverlay);
218                gd.addCheckbox("Include image", IncludeImage);
219                gd.addCheckbox("Include image meta-data", IncludeImageProps);
220                gd.addCheckbox("Add sRGB ICC profile", AddIccProfile);
221                gd.addCheckbox("Upscale image", UpscaleImage);
222                gd.addNumericField("Image upscale factor", ImageUpscaleFactor, 0);
223                gd.addCheckbox("Open PDF after export", OpenPdfAfterExport);
224                
225                gd.showDialog();
226                if (gd.wasCanceled())
227                        return false;
228                
229                IncludeOverlay = gd.getNextBoolean();
230                IncludeImage = gd.getNextBoolean();
231                IncludeImageProps = gd.getNextBoolean();
232                AddIccProfile = gd.getNextBoolean();
233                UpscaleImage = gd.getNextBoolean();
234                ImageUpscaleFactor = Math.max((int) gd.getNextNumber(), 1);
235                OpenPdfAfterExport = gd.getNextBoolean();
236                return true;
237        }
238        
239        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
240        
241    private Path askForFilePath(String dir, String name, String title) {
242        SaveDialog od = new SaveDialog(title, dir, name, DefaultFileExtension);
243        dir  = od.getDirectory();
244        name = od.getFileName();
245        
246        if(name != null) {
247                CurrentOutputDirectory = dir;
248                return Paths.get(dir, name);
249        }
250        else
251                return null;
252    }
253        
254        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
255        private String stripFileExtension(String fileName) {
256                int dotInd = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
257                // if dot is in the first position,
258                // we are dealing with a hidden file rather than a DefaultFileExtension
259                return (dotInd > 0) ? fileName.substring(0, dotInd) : fileName;
260        }
261        
262        
263        private boolean verifyPdfLib() {
264                try {
265                        if (Class.forName("com.lowagie.text.Document") != null) {
266                                return true;
267                        }
268                } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) { }
269                IJ.error("This plugin requires LibrePDF/OpenPDF to be installed!\n" +
270                                "see https://github.com/LibrePDF/OpenPDF\n");
271                return false;
272        }
273
274
275}
276
